itemDescription: Hebrew journalist, editor, essayist, and political leader (1859-1936)

wikipedia_page.main: Nahum ben Joseph Samuel Sokolow (Hebrew: נחום ט' סוקולוב‎ Nachum ben Yosef Shmuel Soqolov, Yiddish: סאָקאָלאָוו‎; 10 January 1859 – 17 May 1936) was a Zionist leader, author, translator, and a pioneer of Hebrew journalism.
